author: costin
msg: Added a bit of code to display the time spent in jk and request.
I had it in my workspace, better to check it in so it doesn't get lost.

author: costin
msg: Fix for 10018, use the same size for the buffer as in jk1.

author: costin
msg: Change back the max message size to what we had in jk1.
Without this we run into problems when jk2 talks with jk1.

author: costin
msg: Minor fix - unix doesn't know about ioctlsocket.
For 5.0 we should deprecate the old 'backward compat' components

author: costin
msg: Add more info to the message.
